creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Currently, only the last request/response in an HTTP Redirect chain are shown in
the Tree Visualizer. This makes debugging scripts which use Follow Redirect very
difficult.

An idea would be to add each individual redirect as a sub-result of the overall
result, which should then include the 1st request and the last response.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Created attachment 4175
Patch -- not the ideal solution, but...
